snippet.title: Shattered Glass: Turnabout Reversal [FT] When Something Smells?
snippet.description:
[A Visual Novelty First-Time Playthrough]

A much older AAO case, presenting an intriguing AU starring Miles Edgeworth and Manfred Von Karma...?

Roles reversed, shifted, and adjusted to create an intriguing universe to be explored... How far will it go? How will it change the characters we know? Tune in and find out!
-----------------------------------------
Shattered Glass: Turnabout Reversal, by TheDoctor!

The world we live in is filled with contradictions. However, some worlds only exist to contradict our own. In a world where prosecutors and defense attorneys are now on opposite sides of the courtroom, is it still possible for the truth to prevail?

It must be possible, for if not... Then what is the point to our existence?

Find it on Court Records here! https://www.forums.court-records.net/viewtopic.php?f=36&t=30254
